body:
@syed-ahmed I am seeing some internal build failures:

```
1 error detected in the compilation of "/tmp/tmpxft_000005b6_00000000-9_SpatialReplicationPadding.compute_70.cpp1.ii".
Build failed: Command failed with exit code 1.
stderr: caffe2/aten/src/THC/THCNumerics.cuh(378): error: more than one operator "-" matches these operands:
            function "at::operator-(const at::Half &, const at::Half &)"
            function "at::operator-(float, at::Half)"
            function "at::operator-(int, at::Half)"
            operand types are: half - at::Half
```
